name: 17_left_join_np

store_sales.query:
SELECT ss_ticket_number, ss_item_sk, ss_customer_sk, ss_sales_price, sr_returned_date_sk, ss_sold_date_sk
	FROM tpc_ds.store_sales WHERE ss_sales_price >= 10.00;

date_dim.query: SELECT d_date, d_date_sk FROM date_dim WHERE d_year=1999;

spark_sql:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (
  SELECT d_date, ss_ticket_number, ss_item_sk, ss_customer_sk, ss_sales_price, sr_returned_date_sk 
  FROM store_sales ss
  JOIN date_dim ON (ss_sold_date_sk=d_date_sk)
  LEFT JOIN store_returns sr ON(ss_ticket_number=sr_ticket_number AND ss_item_sk=sr_item_sk))
